args.py¶

This module contains utilities for parsing the porogram’s command-line arguments.

src.args.parse() → Namespace¶

Return a argparse.Namespace instance containing this program’s command-line arguments, parsed by the argument parser returned by parser().

src.args.parser() → ArgumentParser¶

Return an instance of argparse.ArgumentParser to process this program’s command-line arguments.
